author: jm
msg: bug 4258: fix spamd lockup on FreeBSD by moving to a fixed-buffer-size protocol between spamd parent and children.  This avoids a hang when two messages arrive in the same read(2) call, which gets buffered on FreeBSD

author: stas
msg: make it one version down, so after reload of the file a releaser gets the right
